competitors.name: La Torcia Brick Oven Pizza - Abilene

recommendations: Not appearing for "pizza near me", "pizza", "best pizza Abilene", "pizza delivery near me", "pizza Abilene Texas", "pizza food Abilene" - optimize Google My Business profile with these keywords
Ranking below #1 for 2 keywords - increase customer reviews and engagement to improve rankings
Low Local Pack visibility (25%) - audit your Google My Business completeness, categories, and local citations

competitors.name: Cork And Pig Tavern Allen Ridge, Abilene

reviews.text: We ordered dinner from here Saturday night for delivery to our hotel and everything was delicious. We were in town for our daughter's travel basketball tournaments. We had the chicken fettuccine, rolls with garlic olive oil sauce, caesar salad and meat lovers pizza. It was all great! We had it delivered to our hotel room and it arrived on time and was packaged up well too. We did the chicken fettuccini deal and it came with two drinks! Very good deal! We would definitely return when we come back to Abilene again.

First time I ordered, it was delicious and I was addicted. Second time I ordered‚Ä¶see pics. Called and complained and the owner assured me he would personally make the order. GREAT! He actually cares. NOT! It was no better that the second order PLUS, HE CHARGED ME FOR AN EXTRA SAUCE I OAID FOR ON THE PREVIOUS BAD ORDER AND A DRINK FROM THE PRECIOUS ORDER. If your experience is bad you should compensate everything you originally purchased. I will never go back. He lost what could have been a very regular customer because I work at Walmart right down the street. So here are pics of the gross spinach calzones I got. Again, the first one was so perfect. I looked up what a spinach calzone include in ingredients and how much one should have. This crap had hardly no cheese! It was not cooked fully and was like dough and the ricotta cheese was overcompensated because that ingredient is cheap to add! The pics will show my explanation of ingredients. So sad! This guy also owns Flamin‚Äô Grill across the street. Now I will never go there as well!

First time here. Came for lunch so had lunch special. 2 slices of pizza and free large drink. Pizza slices are huge!  Great flavor all around. Guy working counter was super helpful and friendly. Just down the road from work so I now have a new favorite place.

From services to food... this is by far one of the best places I've been. The calzone was literally the second best I ever had. Only second because my favorite Italian restaurants no longer exist. So if we're being technical now, the best calzone ever! Also, the cashier was so kind and compassionate. I was visiting town due to a sick parent who unfortunately passed away July 30th, the day after my visit to Little Italy. I'm sorry I don't remember the cashiers name, but she left a very positive memory with me and my visit that day. Keep up the awesome work yall! Keep making awesome food too! ‚ô°

Came to experience the food and the location, and we thoroughly enjoyed both! I had the meat Stromboli, and my wife had the pasta sampler. Both dishes were excellent. The folks working here were friendly and it wasn't very expensive either.
Little Italy knocks it out of the park!

Pizza and pasta was great. I would recommend if you need a quick bite to go.

8/13/2025 10:05PM
They told me it would be 20mins and I waited for over 30mins. Then I didn‚Äôt get any ranch with my wings and when I call back MULTIPLE TIMES within 5mins of closing time they refuse to answer the phone. I want a refund for wings I cannot eat. Who eats hot wings without ranch? Not me! I should be refunded if you want me to change my rating. They knotted the bag so tightly I couldn‚Äôt even open it to check my order.

Pro Tip:don‚Äôt knot the bag so the order can be checked by the customer, or double check it yourself. This is inexcusable.

detailedReviews.text: Hands down the absolute best pizza in Abilene! Huge pizza with great toppings

We had the chicken fettuccine, rolls with garlic olive oil sauce, caesar salad and meat lovers pizza. It was all great! detailedReviews.author: Reynaldo Valerio
detailedReviews.text: Bonito y acogedor

detailedReviews.author: Jeremiah Smith
detailedReviews.text: I'm from buffalo new York and this is as close to home as it gets. Affordable prices for the delicious pizza and pasta you receive. Great atmosphere and friendly service.

detailedReviews.author: Jeff Hooper
detailedReviews.text: Fantastic pizza at a good price. This place is a hidden gem. üíé

detailedReviews.author: Kevin Skywalker
detailedReviews.text: Had me wait 15 minutes to tell me theres no slices

detailedReviews.author: Blake Strohl
detailedReviews.text: Never had a bad experience here. Everyone works hard and the owners are very nice. Best pizza in town.

detailedReviews.author: Broadway Royale
detailedReviews.text: Best service I've seen in years. Amazing servers (thank you Star) and amazing staff. I will definitely be ordering from here again!

detailedReviews.author: Dawn Perkovich
detailedReviews.text: Excellent food staff was helpful and friendly. Food was hot and delicious üòã

detailedReviews.author: Wesley Morrison
detailedReviews.text: We got take out. Gentlemen at the counter was very nice.  Our pizza was really good.

detailedReviews.author: Sassy Doll
detailedReviews.text: I got a chicken calzone. It was good.

detailedReviews.author: Chancey Barker
detailedReviews.text: Bought the special lrg pizza, and two subs , Philly and chicken Parm were good, pizza lacked flavor , was more sauce than cheese, lady working register was super friendly and polite even with juggling two phones to take orders

detailedReviews.author: Allison Roberts
detailedReviews.text: Quick, friendly, Always delicious!

detailedReviews.author: Manuel Ramos
detailedReviews.text: Food was awful. Left everything on the table and walked out. I was to embarrassed for them to even say anything.

detailedReviews.author: Lacey Cook
detailedReviews.text: When you're eating too much of a hurry when you're busy you tend to forget things or Overlook stuff that you wouldn't normally. So while I was there I did order a $10 calamari Advertiser kind of thing as a meal with the pizza that I ordered and also a calzone but I never did get the calamari

detailedReviews.author: D Taylor
detailedReviews.text: Good pizza

detailedReviews.author: William
detailedReviews.text: Great food and service

detailedReviews.author: arlenne sanchez
detailedReviews.text: I ordered to go, but honestly it did not have good taste.

detailedReviews.author: Tony Ramos
detailedReviews.text: First time eating there. We'll definitely be back there soon. .

detailedReviews.author: Mary Sniadecki
detailedReviews.text: The pizza üçï was really good. The Coca -Cola Fountain was really great tasting and fresh. I'm not much on heavy rich seasoning this pizza was perfect for me.

detailedReviews.author: Kyle Carnahan
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza and easy to get delivered!

detailedReviews.author: Mike Geisler
detailedReviews.text: Great food!! Newly remodeled!! Family owned and very kind!! Try the burgers at the food truck!! Yum yum!!

detailedReviews.author: Rahannia Shaw
detailedReviews.text:
I really enjoy their food.
I've become a huge fan of their supreme pizza lol the customer service is amazing as always and I will always choose their pizza as #1 in Abilene!

detailedReviews.author: deepak mizar
detailedReviews.text: Best in Abilene‚Ä¶.we will definitely back again

detailedReviews.author: Steven ‚ÄúBigg Steve‚Äù Lomelin
detailedReviews.text:
Came to experience the food and the location, and we thoroughly enjoyed both! I had the meat Stromboli, and my wife had the pasta sampler. Both dishes were excellent. The folks working here were friendly and it wasn't very expensive either.
Little Italy knocks it out of the park!

detailedReviews.author: Jason Harmon
detailedReviews.text: Food was great, and huge portions. The only problem for me was I was picking up 2 meals and 2 drinks. Which totaled 4 bags and 2 drinks which I had to remind the cashier of. I guess the conversation the cashier and the cook was having was far more interesting than helping a customer. Thankfully another customer helped me with the door and to the car. Point is it might be better for your customers to bag everything up when they arrive. Cold items on bottom and hot items on top as heat rises. I would definitely eat here again, but for take out bring help.

detailedReviews.author: Shane Douglas
detailedReviews.text: This place is where its at.  From Texas and working here,  love this place,   the slices of pizzas are huge,  Philly cheese steak is the best I've ever had, and the customer service is awesome.   Atmosphere is unique,  110%recommend!!

detailedReviews.author: Taylen Edgar
detailedReviews.text: Absolutely NASTY rude people

detailedReviews.author: Adam Rakich
detailedReviews.text: Great little pizza place, great sandwiches and pizza. Meat lovers pizza is off the hook. Very reasonable prices as well.

detailedReviews.author: Tracey Freeman
detailedReviews.text: Pizza was perfect!!!

detailedReviews.author: genesis ereu
detailedReviews.text: The pizza was delicious

detailedReviews.author: KALE%! ROME
detailedReviews.text: Went to Dallas ordered Baked Ziti....nothing like Dantes....Dantes pasta is awesome.

detailedReviews.author: El Deplorable
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza in town hands down.

detailedReviews.author: Bobby Morris
detailedReviews.text: They have Coca-cola fountain drinks now!

detailedReviews.author: Diana Benavides
detailedReviews.text: Always great!!!

detailedReviews.author: Alto Native
detailedReviews.text: This place is great. Tasty pizza by the slice, friendly staff and perfectly chilled sodas in the fridge! (Especially the Coke)

detailedReviews.author: Mike Ward
detailedReviews.text: Absolutely phenomenal pizza. Take it from a NYer.

detailedReviews.author: Gabriela Alvarez
detailedReviews.text:
The food is so good, we've been here 2 years and barely tried them and I'm hooked!! I love the pizza, pasta, the burgers are bomb and omg the fries are to die for!! I get them with every order!!! The staff is always so nice!! Love the banter my husband and I sometimes have with the guy at the food truck. Highly recommend!!

UPDATED REVIEW 9/7/2024
THEY GAVE US COLD FOOD AND REFUSED TO GIVE US THE DRINK THAT CAME WITH MY SONS BURGER MEAL. I ADDED THEM TO THE ORDER AND PAID THE EXTRA FEE AND THE LADY AT THE COUNTER SAID IT WASNT HER PROBLEM TO TALK TO THE OUTSIDE GUY, AND ALSO FOOD SAYS IT WILL BE READY THEN ISNT READY TILL 20 MINITES LATER. DO BETTER, VERY DISSAPINTED!!!!

detailedReviews.author: Kaylee Sargent
detailedReviews.text: OMG the pepperoni pizza was the best thing I've ever tasted üòãü§§

detailedReviews.author: Juanita Boyd
detailedReviews.text: Friendly service! Food was great! Pizza by the slice, will come back on our trips to lubbock from dallas!

detailedReviews.author: Ashley Flores
detailedReviews.text: Love this place

detailedReviews.author: Patricia
detailedReviews.text: Pizza is the best!

detailedReviews.author: Renea Vinson
detailedReviews.text: Food was delicious...loved the stromboli and spaghetti.

detailedReviews.author: Thomas Geiger
detailedReviews.text:
Was stunned. This is the best Pizza I‚Äôve had. Not just in Abilene but ever. My wife ate there before me and said it was good but I didn‚Äôt listen. Eventually we tried it together and I was shocked.

No. I‚Äôm not from, nor have I ever been to New York or Chicago so I can‚Äôt compare but I‚Äôve eaten a lot of pizza over my 45 years and I was not expecting the best pizza I‚Äôve ever had to be here in Abilene. Kudos to y‚Äôall!

Btw, we ordered the meat lovers which was great but my all time favorite pizza has always been the ‚ÄúHawaiian‚Äù or as we called it when I was a kid ‚Äú Canadian Bacon & Pineapple‚Äù and this place is now my favorite.

We also got Egg Plant Parmesan, I‚Äôm no expert but it was awesome. My wife has tried the chicken Florentine and really liked it. I‚Äôve just never been a fan of Fettuccini sauce so I can‚Äôt judge but my wife is generally pickier than me. She also is waaaaay pickier when it comes to pizza so I should have listened to her in the first place.  Live & learn.

detailedReviews.author: Parking Full Time
detailedReviews.text: Crust has a fresh bready taste.  The Italian sausage is a sliced link sausage, and it is fantastic.  The other toppings pale in comparison.  Price is excellent for what you get.  If I lived in the area, I would eat here regularly.

detailedReviews.author: Iriel Lucia Marie
detailedReviews.text:
Little Italy is our favourite go-to pizza. All of the food is wonderful and if you get delivery they are usually pretty quick.
How-ever, they had recently texted me a $5 off coupon and when i called to use it they wouldn't honor it. ü§∑üèº‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è
I'll still keep going back.

detailedReviews.author: Gaston Boyd
detailedReviews.text: Everything was good except the service, :(

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers have positive experiences overall. Your 4.5/5 rating from 100 recent reviews shows solid satisfaction with room for growth.

strengthsPerceived: Customers love the huge pizza slices with great flavor and toppings, making it a favorite lunch spot for those nearby. - Boostly marketing services can amplify this
The friendly and compassionate service from staff leaves a lasting positive impression on customers, enhancing their overall dining experience. - review management can highlight this positive aspect
The restaurant offers delicious food at affordable prices, reminiscent of authentic flavors from home, which attracts both locals and visitors. - SEO services can leverage this for better visibility
improvementOpportunities: Negative reviews and reputation issues - review management can address this concern
Long wait times and order inaccuracies - Boostly marketing services can improve this
Poor service and rude staff interactions - social media marketing can improve this area
